WorkItem.Summary: Duplicate identifier not detected in constructor arguments

Comments.Message:
Using the latest code under development, I do see the below error for the above code, so it appears we've already addressed this in the upcoming release.  Thanks for reporting though!

Error	1	Duplicate identifier 'thing'.	C:\temp\file1.ts	24	17	file1.ts
Thanks for checking!  I'll be sure to check the develop branch to see if issues are already fixed in the future ;)
